attributes.action: Please move Aasia abroad like Malala.
attributes.additional_details: Everyone knows about this case. Its clearly showed the few illitrate women had arguments and its become a big issue. Aasia has win the case but Pakistan is burning due to few fundamentalist. If she will stay in Pakistan then she will be killed and she has a right to live. She has been punished for 8 years although she was innocent. Please save her
attributes.background: Save Aasia and move her abroad. lease save Aasia bibi as she has win the case and she has full right to live and enjoy her like as a normal human being. She has already been in sentenced for 8 years although she wasn't a culprit, infect she is a victim. Please bring her abroad like Malala
